TESTE LOCAL:

1) docker build -t sigsc-backend .

2) docker run -d `  -p 3000:8080 `  --name meu-backend-teste `  -v ${PWD}/firebase-service-account.json:/usr/src/app/firebase-service-account.json `  -e FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_PATH=./firebase-service-account.json `  -e NODE_ENV=production `  -e JWT_SECRET=teste-local-docker `  sigsc-backend

3) docker logs -f meu-backend-teste
